subject: Question
description_text:
Hi there!

I am currently in the market for a set of Plus X pedals with haptic
feedback.
I am now wondering if there will be any extra import/customs fees.

I have been trying to find an answer online, but cant find a conclusive
answer. Therefore i will ask the question directly!

Are there any extra import or customs fees added after purchase on the
website? I am located in The Netherlands and the price for the product will
be around 254 dollar US.

Thank you in advance!

Kind regards,

Daan Bergman

conversations.body_text: Hi Daan Bergman,    You can purchase on our official website, and we will ship your order from our German warehouse with no customs duties.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals
